Now that we have covered the basics of using R and RStudio including importing, cleaning, summarizing and plotting data, we'll continue with a few additional and useful beginner/intermediate skills. Here is the outline for our last day of training:

1. Binds and Joins

    - Differences and Usage
    - Bind Rows
    - Join Basics
    - Left Join

2. Dates and Times

    - Basics and Classes
    - Converting from character dates
    - Time Zones
    - Extracting parts of a date-time object
    

3. Final Course Exercise

Students will have the opportunity to bring many of the class concepts together in this final exercise.
